thread.title: Watch: MCTS driver helps man whose car got stuck in snow
thread.title_full: Watch: MCTS driver helps man whose car got stuck in snow

author: CBS
title: Watch: MCTS driver helps man whose car got stuck in snow
text: Watch: MCTS driver helps man whose car got stuck in snow By: [CBS 58 Newsroom](/bios/cbs-58-newsroom) Posted: Jan 12, 2024 4:20 PM CST - 4:24 [Blizzard Warning issued for Fond du Lac and Sheboygan counties] - 2:13 [Meet CBS 58’s Pet of the Week: Prince] - 5:14 [CBS 58’s Feel Good Fridays: Family films and Bucks basketball] - 2:13 [New police video shows moments, aftermath, when Greenfield woman...] - 2:11 [Menominee Tribal leaders held an open house as the Kenosha casino...] - 1:51 [Senate GOP leader floats middle income tax cuts, criticizes medical...] - 1:35 [Subzero temperatures threaten Southeast Wisconsin; how to beat...] - 2:46 [MPS board votes to put $252 million referendum on April ballot] - 1:13 [MCSO hosts hiring event, hopes to find members of Latino community] - 1:40 [Don’t drive in near whiteout conditions this weekend, but if...] - 0:41 [Milwaukee police squad, SUV crash into creek near 44th and Congress] MILWAUKEE (CBS 58) -- Check out this video from the Milwaukee County Transit System. Friday morning, one of its bus drivers, Deneen Tate, got out of her bus to help a person who lost control of his car and ended up in a snowbank. When the bus driver saw the car struggling, she pulled over near his car at Old Orchard and Boundary to help out. Together, they rocked the car back and forth and got it on the road. Tate waited to make sure the driver made it out okay, yelling, "drive safely" as he drove away. The driver of the stuck car got in touch with MCTS, saying, "God bless her."
